titleInfo.title: Report of the acting Secretary of the Interior relative to the swamp and overflowed lands in Louisiana

mods.note: Caption title; At head of title: 31st Congress, 1st session. Senate. Ex. doc. no. 68; August 26, 1850. Ordered to lie on the table, and be printed. September 6, 1850. Ordered that 2,000 extra copies be printed; Accompanying map has caption: Map of Louisiana representing the several land districts. Prepared to accompany the Surveyor Generals report. Surveyor Generals Office, Donaldsonville, La., Oct. 18th, 1849. R. W. Boyd, Sur. Genl. La.; There may have been more than one map originally accompanying this document. Librarys LLMVC copy is accompanied only by the map described above. Portions of map are shaded in pink (hand-colored).

titleInfo.title: LSU Libraries Louisiana Waterways Management Collection
